Package ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    This class creates a simple button widget that may invoke a certain method when pressed.
    Canvas
    This class is the implementation of Canvas widget that is provides the painting functionality.
    CloseButton
    This class represents a close button widget that can be added to any zone and will attempt to close or remove the parent when pressed.
    Container
    This abstract class implements the basic functionality shared by all container widgets.
    Drawer
    This abstract class implements the basic functionality shared by all drawer widgets.
    FileBrowserDialog
    This class implements file browsing functionality for a certain folder, file extension filter can also be specified.
    IconButton
    This class creates a simple button widget that has an icon instead of text and may invoke a certain method when pressed.
    MoveableItem
    This class implements the default functionality of all widgets used in ePad application, such as the default drawing method, ability to be placed into and dragged out of the drawers and default multitouch interactions (move, scale and rotate).
    Important: every new widget must extend this class to take the advantage of this default functionality and also to be handled properly by SimpleMarshaller class.
    RectangularContainer
    This container class keeps the child objects together while preserving their original coordinates.
    ResetDialog
    This dialog is displayed after a certain period of inactivity (as specified in settings.xml) and offers the user several options: save, print, reset or continue painting.
    RotatingContainer
    This container class organises child objects in a circular pattern and can be rotated around its centre to reveal more items.
    RotatingDrawer
    This class represents a circular rotating drawer widget.
    SaveDialog
    This dialog allows user to save the entire workspace and enter their name so that it can be retrieved later.
    SlidingDrawer
    This class represents a square sliding drawer widget.
    SplashScreen
    This class displays a splash screen that is shown when the application is loading.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ApplicationState
    Enumerator of application's states.
